map.yml:
--- #ref
# ADD OR REMOVE CHANNELS AND PRESS RUN
channels:
  - cds-alerts
  - abc-alerts
--- #<<ref
!_ route_tmpl:
  - receiver: !tmpl '{{$v}}-slack'
    matchers:
      - name: channel
        value: !yq $v
--- #export
!yq .
---
routes: !map .channels .route_tmpl
---
routes:
  !map [abc, xyz]:
    !_ <<:
        receiver: !tmpl '{{$v}}-slack'
        matchers:
          - name: channel
            value: !yq $v
---
map_routes:
  !map [abc, xyz]:
    !_ <<:
      !yq '$v': !tmpl '{{$v}}-value'
---
routes:
  !map [abc, xyz]: !_
    - receiver: !tmpl '{{$v}}-slack'
      matchers:
        - name: channel
          value: !yq $v
merge.yml:
--- #export
obj:
  c: 3
  d: 4
list:
  - 3
  - 4
---
obj:
  start:
    <<: !yq .obj
    e: 5
  end:
    a: 1
    b: 2
    <<: !yq .obj
  middle:
    a: 1
    b: 2
    <<: !yq .obj
    e: 5
  total:
    <<: !yq .obj
list:
  start:
    - <<: !yq .list
    - 5
  end:
    - 1
    - 2
    - <<: !yq .list
  middle: 
    - 1
    - 2
    - <<: !yq .list
    - 5
    - 6
  total:
    - <<: !yq .list
yq.yml:
--- #export
id: example
items:
  - 1
  - 2
  - 3
---
key: val
id: !yq .id
nums: !yq .items[2]
